Posts.Content:
Hi there,
 
I am researching the benefits of being kind and compassionate to yourself after being diagnosed with cancer. This research aims to further our understanding of how to best support people after they are diagnosed with cancer. The research is sponsored by the Humber NHS Foundation Trust and is being carried out as part of my training in Clinical Psychology at The University of Hull.
 
I am looking for volunteers who would like to take part in this research! Taking part involves filling in an online questionnaire and should take no more than 15 minutes of your time. The more people that participate the clearer our understanding will be about
 the role of self-compassion in well being after cancer and therefore you participation would be greatly valued!
 
-*-
Please write to the Administrator of HealingWell for permission to post this. Write to:
admin@healingwell.com
Thank you.
Posts.Title: People diagnosed with cancer needed for new online research!

Posts.Content:
Hi there,
 
I am researching the benefits of being kind and compassionate to yourself after being diagnosed with cancer. This research aims to further our understanding of how to best support people after they are diagnosed with cancer. The research is sponsored by the Humber NHS Foundation Trust and is being carried out as part of my training in Clinical Psychology at The University of Hull.
 
I am looking for volunteers who would like to take part in this research! Taking part involves filling in an online questionnaire and should take no more than 15 minutes of your time. The more people that participate the clearer our understanding will be about

If you would like to see the study information and questionnaires please follow this link
 
Thank you for your interest!
 
Leah Glover
Trainee Clinical Psychologist
Humber NHS Foundation Trust

Posts.Content:

Sorry but your links were removed following Healingwell policy that all research and surveys must have Administrator approval. You can email him through the link at the top of the page and if approved reinsert the link and we would love to help!
